testCase.name: MainDashboard2Component should create the component
MainDashboard2Component should initialize with correct title
MainDashboard2Component should initialize collapsed signal as false
MainDashboard2Component should initialize currentLanguage signal as English
MainDashboard2Component should initialize darkModeValue signal as light
MainDashboard2Component should add languages in constructor
MainDashboard2Component should set up language in ngOnInit with stored language (en)
MainDashboard2Component should set up language in ngOnInit with stored language (fr)
MainDashboard2Component should set up language in ngOnInit with no stored language
MainDashboard2Component should initialize dark mode from DarkModeService in ngOnInit
MainDashboard2Component should initialize dark mode with default light theme if DarkModeService returns null
MainDashboard2Component should change languageto French
MainDashboard2Component should change language to English
MainDashboard2Component should return correct theme aria label
MainDashboard2Component should return correct color theme aria label
MainDashboard2Component should toggle fullscreen when not in fullscreen
MainDashboard2Component should exit fullscreen when in fullscreen
MainDashboard2Component should handle fullscreen error
MainDashboard2Component should toggle dark mode to dark
MainDashboard2Component should toggle dark mode to light
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavWidth for mobile
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavWidth for non-mobile collapsed
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavWidth for non-mobile non-collapsed
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavMode for mobile
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavMode for non-mobile
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavOpened for mobile and collapsed
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavOpened for mobile and non-collapsed
MainDashboard2Component should compute sidenavOpened for non-mobile
MainDashboard2Component should toggle sidenav collapsed state
MainDashboard2Component should toggle sidenav when menu button is clicked
MainDashboard2Component should display correct title in toolbar
MainDashboard2Component should show mobile menu button on mobile
MainDashboard2Component should hide mobile menu button on non-mobile
MainDashboard2Component should toggle fullscreen when fullscreen button is clicked
MainDashboard2Component should toggle dark mode when button toggle group changes
MainDashboard2Component should open dark mode menu when theme button is clicked
MainDashboard2Component should open color theme menu when color theme button is clicked
MainDashboard2Component should open language menu when language button is clicked
MainDashboard2Component should close sidenav on mobile when content is clicked
MainDashboard2Component should not close sidenav on non-mobile when content is clicked
MainDashboard2Component should render custom sidenav with correct collapsed state
MainDashboard2Component should apply correct sidenav width and mode
MainDashboard2Component should apply correct sidenav content margin for non-mobile
MainDashboard2Component should apply zero margin for mobile
MainDashboard2Component should render user component
MainDashboard2Component should handle dark mode menu item click
MainDashboard2Component should handle color theme menu item click
MainDashboard2Component should handle language menu item click
